history.narrative: Law 8-240 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-560, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 1990, and December 18, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-323 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
